page.title: 08KEMPSEY PRIMARY SCHOOL.
page.content: In Kempsey school the subjects taught are Mathematics,English,Art and Craft,and P.E. In addition to these subjects the older children in Unit 1 also take some Science and Cookery. All classes also undertake project work from time to time. Outside normal school hours there are six clubs which the children can take part in if they want to. These are Football,Gymnastics,Rounders, Netball,Choir and Orchestra. The school also puts on special events at different times of the school year (from September to August). There is a play at Christmas, a Summer concert and a School Sports Day. Also on the last day of term the children are allowed to bring games to school from home and play with them.
